subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: FORT LAUDERDALE, Fla. (AP) — Andy MacPhail will not deny it. The job that started his highly successful career in baseball — business manager of Bradenton Pirates in 1976 — was the result of nepotism.
snippet: FORT LAUDERDALE, Fla. (AP) — Andy MacPhail will not deny it. The job that started his highly successful career in baseball — business manager of Bradenton Pirates in 1976 — was the result of nepotism.
